title: ISic002753. Fragment of a bilingual dedication to Priapus
body:
Facsimile Images

a
[---]κεν ἔνθα καὶ ἔνθ̣[---]
[---]σθαι τοὺς ἀπʼἄστεω[ς---]
[---]χεσθαι τοὺς ἀπʼ Ἄκιδο[ς---]
[---]αὐτῷ καρπὸν ὡς ὀρ[---]
5 [---]τοῦτο τὸ παχὺ τοῖς σ[---]
b
[---]me Samius utroque in[---]
[---en]ormem penem ut osten[---]
( vac. 2)Rubri Sami fil(i)[---]

Apparatus criticus

Minimal text, checked against the photograph

translation

commentary
